reuters.title: TRIANGLE INDUSTRIES INC 4TH QTR OPER SHR LOSS THREE CTS VS PROFIT 27 CTS
reuters.body: Shr 64 cts vs 1.16 dlrs Net 602,000 vs 1,079,893 Sales 8,208,000 vs 11.6 mln NOTE: Prior year net includes gain 1,317,000 dlrs or 1.41 dlrs shr on sale of West Paces Racquet Club. Current year net includes 15 ct shr extraordinary gain. Reuter 
